import sys

print\(''=== Module Import Tests ===''\)

modules = [
    \(''db'', ''ConnectMysql''\),
    \(''runner'', ''RunYaml''\),
    \(''exceptions'', None\),
    \(''yaml_validator'', ''YAMLConfigValidator''\),
    \(''validate'', None\),
    \(''extract'', None\),
    \(''create_function'', None\),
]

for module_name, class_name in modules:
    try:
        module = __import__\(module_name\)
        if class_name:
            getattr\(module, class_name\)
        print\(f''[OK] {module_name} module imported''\)
    except Exception as e:
        print\(f''[FAIL] {module_name}: {e}''\)

print\(''''\)
print\(''=== Shell Module Tests ===''\)

    from yh_shell import YHShell
    print\(''[OK] yh_shell module imported''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''[FAIL] yh_shell: {e}''\)

    print\(''[OK] shell.commands module imported''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''[FAIL] shell.commands: {e}''\)

try:
    from shell.project_generator import ProjectGenerator
    print\(''[OK] shell.project_generator module imported''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''[FAIL] shell.project_generator: {e}''\)
")

import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''.''\)

print\(''=== Full Module Import Tests ===''\)
print\(\)

# Test all modules
modules_to_test = [
    \(''db'', ''ConnectMysql''\),
    \(''runner'', ''RunYaml''\),
    \(''exceptions'', None\),
    \(''yaml_validator'', ''YAMLConfigValidator''\),
    \(''validate'', None\),
    \(''extract'', None\),
    \(''create_function'', None\),
    \(''my_builtins'', None\),
    \(''render_template_obj'', None\),
    \(''logging_config'', None\),
    \(''safe_import'', None\),
]

failed = []
for module_name, class_name in modules_to_test:
    try:
        module = __import__\(module_name\)
        if class_name:
            getattr\(module, class_name\)
        print\(f''[OK] {module_name}''\)
    except Exception as e:
        print\(f''[FAIL] {module_name}: {e}''\)
        failed.append\(\(module_name, str\(e\)\)\)

print\(\)
print\(''=== Shell Module Tests ===''\)
try:
    from yh_shell import YHShell
    shell = YHShell\(\)
    print\(''[OK] yh_shell - YHShell instantiated''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''[FAIL] yh_shell: {e}''\)
    failed.append\(\(''yh_shell'', str\(e\)\)\)

try:
    from shell.commands import TestCommandHandler, AdvancedCommandHandler, VariableCommandHandler
    print\(''[OK] shell.commands - All handlers''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''[FAIL] shell.commands: {e}''\)
    failed.append\(\(''shell.commands'', str\(e\)\)\)

try:
    from shell.project_generator import ProjectGenerator
    gen = ProjectGenerator\(\)
    print\(''[OK] shell.project_generator - ProjectGenerator instantiated''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''[FAIL] shell.project_generator: {e}''\)
    failed.append\(\(''shell.project_generator'', str\(e\)\)\)

print\(\)
if failed:
    print\(f''=== Summary: {len\(failed\)} FAILED ===''\)
    for name, err in failed:
        print\(f''  {name}: {err}''\)
else:
    print\(''=== Summary: ALL TESTS PASSED ===''\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''.''\)

print\(''=== Functional Tests ===''\)
print\(\)

# Test 1: Safe eval condition
print\(''[Test 1] Safe Eval Condition''\)
from runner import RunYaml
import types

raw = {''config'': {''name'': ''test''}}
module = types.ModuleType\(''test_module''\)
g = {}
run_yaml = RunYaml\(raw, module, g, validate_config=False\)

tests = [
    \(True, True, ''boolean True''\),
    \(False, False, ''boolean False''\),
    \(1, True, ''integer 1''\),
    \(0, False, ''integer 0''\),
    \(''true'', True, ''string true''\),
    \(''false'', False, ''string false''\),
    \(''1'', True, ''string 1''\),
    \(''0'', False, ''string 0''\),
]

passed = 0
failed = 0
for value, expected, desc in tests:
    try:
        result = run_yaml._safe_eval_condition\(value\)
        if result == expected:
            passed += 1
            print\(f''  [OK] {desc}: {value} -> {result}''\)
        else:
            failed += 1
            print\(f''  [FAIL] {desc}: expected {expected}, got {result}''\)
    except Exception as e:
        failed += 1
        print\(f''  [FAIL] {desc}: {e}''\)

print\(f''  Result: {passed}/{passed+failed} passed''\)
print\(\)

# Test 2: Safe get function
print\(''[Test 2] Safe Get Function''\)
run_yaml.context[''test_func''] = lambda x: x * 2
run_yaml.context[''test_value''] = 42

try:
    func = run_yaml._safe_get_function\(''test_func''\)
    result = func\(5\)
    if result == 10:
        print\(f''  [OK] Get and call test_func\(5\) = {result}''\)
    else:
        print\(f''  [FAIL] Expected 10, got {result}''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''  [FAIL] {e}''\)

# Test dangerous function names
dangerous_names = [''os.system'', ''import os'', ''func\(\)'', ''__class__'']
for name in dangerous_names:
    try:
        run_yaml._safe_get_function\(name\)
        print\(f''  [FAIL] Should reject: {name}''\)
    except Exception:
        print\(f''  [OK] Rejected dangerous: {name}''\)

print\(\)

# Test 3: YAML Validator
print\(''[Test 3] YAML Config Validator''\)
from yaml_validator import YAMLConfigValidator

validator = YAMLConfigValidator\(\)

# Valid config
valid_config = {
    ''config'': {
        ''name'': ''test'',
        ''base_url'': ''https://api.example.com'',
        ''timeout'': 30,
    }
}

try:
    result = validator.validate_config\(valid_config\)
    print\(f''  [OK] Valid config accepted''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''  [FAIL] Valid config rejected: {e}''\)

# Invalid config
invalid_config = {
    ''config'': {
        ''timeout'': -1,  # Invalid: negative
    }
}

try:
    validator.validate_config\(invalid_config\)
    print\(f''  [FAIL] Invalid config accepted \(should fail\)''\)
except Exception:
    print\(f''  [OK] Invalid config rejected \(negative timeout\)''\)

print\(\)

# Test 4: Database SQL validation
print\(''[Test 4] Database SQL Validation''\)
from db import ConnectMysql

db = ConnectMysql.__new__\(ConnectMysql\)
db.host = ''localhost''
db.user = ''test''
db.password = ''test''
db.port = 3306
db.database = ''test_db''
db.connection = None

# Safe SQL
safe_sqls = [
    ''SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = %s'',
    ''INSERT INTO users \(name\) VALUES \(%s\)'',
    ''DELETE FROM users WHERE id = %s'',
]

for sql in safe_sqls:
    try:
        db._validate_sql\(sql\)
        print\(f''  [OK] Accepted safe SQL: {sql[:40]}...''\)
    except Exception as e:
        print\(f''  [FAIL] Rejected safe SQL: {e}''\)

# Dangerous SQL
dangerous_sqls = [
    \(''DROP TABLE users'', ''DROP TABLE''\),
    \(''DELETE FROM users'', ''DELETE all''\),
    \(''TRUNCATE TABLE users'', ''TRUNCATE''\),
]

for sql, desc in dangerous_sqls:
    try:
        db._validate_sql\(sql\)
        print\(f''  [FAIL] Accepted dangerous SQL \({desc}\): {sql}''\)
    except ValueError:
        print\(f''  [OK] Rejected dangerous SQL \({desc}\)''\)

print\(\)
print\(''=== All Functional Tests Completed ===''\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''.''\)

print\(''=== Shell Command Tests ===''\)
print\(\)

from yh_shell import YHShell
from shell.commands import VariableCommandHandler
from shell.project_generator import ProjectGenerator

# Create shell instance
shell = YHShell\(\)

# Test inspire command
print\(''[Test] inspire command''\)
import io
import contextlib

f = io.StringIO\(\)
with contextlib.redirect_stdout\(f\):
    shell.do_inspire\(''''\)
output = f.getvalue\(\)
if ''æ¿€åŠ±è¯­å½•'' in output or ''YH'' in output:
    print\(''  [OK] inspire works''\)
else:
    print\(''  [FAIL] inspire output unexpected''\)

# Test vars command
print\(\)
print\(''[Test] vars command''\)
shell.do_vars\(''''\)
if len\(shell.session_vars\) == 0:
    print\(''  [OK] vars shows empty list''\)
else:
    print\(f''  [INFO] vars shows {len\(shell.session_vars\)} variables''\)

# Test vars set
shell.do_vars\(''set test_var hello''\)
if ''test_var'' in shell.session_vars and shell.session_vars[''test_var''] == ''hello'':
    print\(''  [OK] vars set works''\)
else:
    print\(''  [FAIL] vars set failed''\)

# Test vars get
f = io.StringIO\(\)
with contextlib.redirect_stdout\(f\):
    shell.do_vars\(''get test_var''\)
output = f.getvalue\(\)
if ''hello'' in output:
    print\(''  [OK] vars get works''\)
else:
    print\(''  [FAIL] vars get failed''\)

# Test vars del
shell.do_vars\(''del test_var''\)
if ''test_var'' not in shell.session_vars:
    print\(''  [OK] vars del works''\)
else:
    print\(''  [FAIL] vars del failed''\)

# Test project generator
print\(\)
print\(''[Test] project generator''\)
gen = ProjectGenerator\(\)
import tempfile
import os

temp_dir = tempfile.mkdtemp\(\)
test_project = os.path.join\(temp_dir, ''test_api_project''\)

try:
    gen.generate_test_project\(test_project\)
    
    # Check if project was created
    if os.path.exists\(test_project\):
        print\(''  [OK] project directory created''\)
        
        # Check subdirectories
        dirs = [''config'', ''tests'', ''reports'', ''data'', ''utils'']
        all_exist = all\(os.path.exists\(os.path.join\(test_project, d\)\) for d in dirs\)
        if all_exist:
            print\(''  [OK] all subdirectories created''\)
        else:
            print\(''  [FAIL] some subdirectories missing''\)
        
        # Check files
        files = [
            ''config/test_config.yaml'',
            ''tests/api_tests.yaml'',
            ''run.py'',
            ''README.md'',
        ]
        files_exist = all\(os.path.exists\(os.path.join\(test_project, f\)\) for f in files\)
        if files_exist:
            print\(''  [OK] all project files created''\)
        else:
            print\(''  [FAIL] some project files missing''\)
    else:
        print\(''  [FAIL] project directory not created''\)
finally:
    # Cleanup
    import shutil
    if os.path.exists\(temp_dir\):
        shutil.rmtree\(temp_dir\)

print\(\)
print\(''=== All Shell Command Tests Completed ===''\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''.''\)

print\(''=== Complete Test Suite ===''\)
print\(\)

# Test 1: Module Imports
print\(''[1] Module Import Tests''\)
modules = [
    \(''db'', ''ConnectMysql''\),
    \(''runner'', ''RunYaml''\),
    \(''exceptions'', None\),
    \(''yaml_validator'', ''YAMLConfigValidator''\),
    \(''validate'', None\),
    \(''extract'', None\),
    \(''create_function'', None\),
]

import_ok = 0
for mod, cls in modules:
    try:
        m = __import__\(mod\)
        if cls:
            getattr\(m, cls\)
        import_ok += 1
    except:
        pass

print\(f''  Result: {import_ok}/{len\(modules\)} modules imported''\)
print\(\)

# Test 2: Security Functions
print\(''[2] Security Function Tests''\)
from runner import RunYaml
import types

raw = {''config'': {''name'': ''test''}}
module = types.ModuleType\(''test_module''\)
g = {}
run_yaml = RunYaml\(raw, module, g, validate_config=False\)

security_tests = 0
security_passed = 0

# Safe eval tests
tests = [\(True, True\), \(False, False\), \(1, True\), \(0, False\)]
for val, exp in tests:
    security_tests += 1
    if run_yaml._safe_eval_condition\(val\) == exp:
        security_passed += 1

# Dangerous input tests
dangerous = [''import os'', ''__class__'', ''exec\(print\)'']
for d in dangerous:
    security_tests += 1
    try:
        run_yaml._safe_eval_condition\(d\)
    except:
        security_passed += 1

print\(f''  Result: {security_passed}/{security_tests} security tests passed''\)
print\(\)

# Test 3: YAML Validation
print\(''[3] YAML Validation Tests''\)
from yaml_validator import YAMLConfigValidator

v = YAMLConfigValidator\(\)
yaml_tests = 0
yaml_passed = 0

# Valid config
try:
    v.validate_config\({''config'': {''name'': ''test''}}\)
    yaml_tests += 1
    yaml_passed += 1
except:
    yaml_tests += 1

# Invalid config
try:
    v.validate_config\({''config'': {''timeout'': -1}}\)
    yaml_tests += 1
except:
    yaml_tests += 1
    yaml_passed += 1

print\(f''  Result: {yaml_passed}/{yaml_tests} validation tests passed''\)
print\(\)

# Test 4: Database Security
print\(''[4] Database Security Tests''\)
from db import ConnectMysql

db = ConnectMysql.__new__\(ConnectMysql\)
db.host = ''localhost''
db.user = ''test''
db.password = ''test''
db.port = 3306
db.database = ''test_db''
db.connection = None

db_tests = 0
db_passed = 0

# Safe SQL
safe_sql = [''SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = %s'', ''INSERT INTO users VALUES \(%s\)'']
for sql in safe_sql:
    db_tests += 1
    try:
        db._validate_sql\(sql\)
        db_passed += 1
    except:
        pass

# Dangerous SQL
dangerous_sql = [''DROP TABLE users'', ''DELETE FROM users'', ''TRUNCATE users'']
for sql in dangerous_sql:
    db_tests += 1
    try:
        db._validate_sql\(sql\)
    except ValueError:
        db_passed += 1

print\(f''  Result: {db_passed}/{db_tests} database tests passed''\)
print\(\)

# Test 5: Shell Commands
print\(''[5] Shell Command Tests''\)
from yh_shell import YHShell

shell = YHShell\(\)
shell_tests = 0
shell_passed = 0

# inspire
try:
    shell.do_inspire\(''''\)
    shell_tests += 1
    shell_passed += 1
except:
    shell_tests += 1

# vars set
try:
    shell.do_vars\(''set test_key test_value''\)
    shell_tests += 1
    if ''test_key'' in shell.session_vars:
        shell_passed += 1
except:
    shell_tests += 1

# vars get
try:
    shell.do_vars\(''get test_key''\)
    shell_tests += 1
    shell_passed += 1
except:
    shell_tests += 1

# vars del
try:
    shell.do_vars\(''del test_key''\)
    shell_tests += 1
    if ''test_key'' not in shell.session_vars:
        shell_passed += 1
except:
    shell_tests += 1

print\(f''  Result: {shell_passed}/{shell_tests} shell tests passed''\)
print\(\)

# Test 6: Project Generator
print\(''[6] Project Generator Tests''\)
from shell.project_generator import ProjectGenerator
import tempfile
import shutil

gen = ProjectGenerator\(\)
temp_dir = tempfile.mkdtemp\(\)
proj_tests = 0
proj_passed = 0

try:
    test_proj = temp_dir + ''/test_api_project''
    gen.generate_test_project\(test_proj\)
    proj_tests += 1
    
    import os
    if os.path.exists\(test_proj\):
        proj_passed += 1
        
    dirs = [''config'', ''tests'', ''reports'', ''data'', ''utils'']
    if all\(os.path.exists\(os.path.join\(test_proj, d\)\) for d in dirs\):
        proj_tests += 1
        proj_passed += 1
    
    files = [''config/test_config.yaml'', ''tests/api_tests.yaml'', ''run.py'', ''README.md'']
    if all\(os.path.exists\(os.path.join\(test_proj, f\)\) for f in files\):
        proj_tests += 1
        proj_passed += 1
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''  Error: {e}''\)
finally:
    if os.path.exists\(temp_dir\):
        shutil.rmtree\(temp_dir\)

print\(f''  Result: {proj_passed}/{proj_tests} project generator tests passed''\)
print\(\)

# Summary
total_tests = import_ok + security_tests + yaml_tests + db_tests + shell_tests + proj_tests
total_passed = security_passed + yaml_passed + db_passed + shell_passed + proj_passed + import_ok

print\(''='' * 40\)
print\(f''TOTAL: {total_passed}/{total_tests} tests passed''\)
print\(''='' * 40\)

if total_passed == total_tests:
    print\(''[SUCCESS] All tests PASSED!''\)
else:
    print\(f''[INFO] {total_tests - total_passed} tests failed''\)
")
